description.english: Win 10 Scenarios.
Win 50 Scenarios.
Win 100 Scenarios.
Miss the target hex with an artillery spotting round but hit a hex containing enemy units anyway.
Overrun and eliminate three squads at once with a vehicle.
Have two heroes generated as part of the same attack.
Have just Ash (or Sgt Ash) win a melee versus at least one squad.
Leave one of your Occupation Event markers untouched for the entire scenario, and win.
Have a leader with the Decisive skill and win the scenario without ever using it.
Win every single initiative roll in a scenario, and win the scenario.
Do a Direct Fire attack with 10 or more Firepower.
Successfully withdraw from a melee.
Enter melee against a group of defenseless enemy units.
Eliminate a Suicide Sapper with opportunity fire.
Eliminate a sniper with another sniper.
Destroy a German armored vehicle that is NOT a Tiger.
Reinforce an ongoing melee.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of Normandy.
Win 12 different Heroes of Normandy scenarios.
Win 48 different Heroes of Normandy scenarios.
Succesfully rally 5 or more units with Major Tom in one scenario.
Have Lt. Clarkson successfully withdraw from a melee.
Heal a wounded Lord Holmes with a medic.
Destroy a Tiger tank with the main gun of a Sherman tank.
Land a glider on top of enemy units.
Destroy an armored vehicle with an RPzB54.
Cause units to retreat from a German flamethrower attack.
Successfully Spot Sgt. Livingston.
As the Germans, win the scenario Attack of the Kochgeschirr on default or harder settings.
Using opportunity fire with an ordnance weapon, destroy a vehicle as it comes through bocage.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Nam.
Win 12 different Heroes of the Nam scenarios.
Win 34 different Heroes of the Nam scenarios.
Unload 4 or more squads from helicopters in a single turn.
As the ANZAC player, eliminate all enemies in a melee where you are outnumbered.
Eliminate Lt. Ryan (or Ryan) 10 times (either side, any number of scenarios).
Set off three or more claymores in a single impulse.
Cause casualties with a Sniper at a range of 9 or more hexes.
Move a US Army Hero 6 hexes on foot in 3 consecutive turns.
Use three squads to eliminate Sgt. Dunk in melee.
Eliminate all enemies in the first round of an Ambush melee.
Eliminate an Advisor in melee combat.
Successfully rally with a Chaplain.
Complete a scenario from Days of Villainy.
At the end of an impulse, have six or more MMC or SMC counters alone in their hexes.
Win a scenario without losing any of your Technicals.
Destroy an unarmored vehicle with an ordnance weapon that has a Penetration value of 4 or more.
In the On the Road to Sirte scenario, transport Salem over four or more offroad hexes without killing him.
Win the Game Over scenario as the Loyalist side.
Complete a scenario from Heroes Against the Red Star
Win 11 different Heroes Against the Red Star scenarios.
Win 33 different Heroes Against the Red Star scenarios.
Have an A-10 Thunderbolt II survive being struck by anti-aircraft fire.
Successfully rally a Shaken unit with Fight or Die.
Attack 3 or more hexes with a single airstrike.
Cause an ATGM shot to be interrupted with opportunity fire.
Use the La Marseillaise skill to attempt to rally units that failed their first rally attempt this impulse.
Have a vehicle survive a hit by a HEAT weapon only because of its red armor values.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Falklands.
Win 12 different Heroes of the Falklands scenarios.
Win 25 different Heroes of the Falklands scenarios.
Using an ordnance weapon, satchel charge, or flamethrower, cause casualties to units inside of a bunker.
Avoid a Damage Check due to the Higher Elevation penalty.
Have a wounded Hero be the sole survivor of a Melee.
Successfully self-rally with an SRP unit.
Win a scenario without placing any optional bunkers in Setup.
Make an enemy Ship unit withdraw from the scenario.
Succesfully rally 3 or more units with Captain Mercury in one scenario.
Complete a scenario from Heroes in Defiance
Win 11 different Heroes in Defiance scenarios.
Win 33 different Heroes in Defiance scenarios.
Destroy an armored vehicle by using a sniper rifle or machine gun.
Have a unit move at least four or more hexes on water using a Rubber Boat.
Dismount two or more mounted units at the same time.
Using Hit & Run movement, move at least two hexes, fire, and then move at least two more hexes, all in the same impulse.
Have at least three weapon jams in one scenario.
Use Lt. von Martial to lead a Close Assault that destroys a Matilda tank.
Destroy a Barricade.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Pacific.
Win 12 different Heroes of the Pacific scenarios.
Win 21 different Heroes of the Pacific scenarios.
Use Opportunity Fire to eliminate a unit doing a Banzai attack.
Sink an opponent’s amphibious transport that is carrying passengers.
Eliminate enemy units by collapsing all cave entrances.
Collapse a cave entrance.
Initiate a Banzai attack with 9 or more participants.
Move units 6 or more hexes through tunnels in a single scenario.
Use the Warrior Spirit skill to cancel a Damage Check of 6 or more.
Complete a scenario from Battles to the Rhine.
Cause eight or more fires to start in a single scenario.
Have a Good Order unit make a Morale Check to remain in a Fire 1 hex.
As the Americans, win the Cowboy Up! scenario by the end of Turn 7 on default or harder settings.
Use up all of your vehicle smoke supply in a scenario.
Fire white phosphorus into a building, bunker, or cave containing enemy units.
Complete a scenario created by the Battle Generator.
Win a campaign created by the Battle Generator.
Complete a Custom Scenario downloaded from the Steam Workshop.
Have a Campaign Leader increase their stats to Morale 8 and Leadership 2.
Complete a Battle Generator campaign without your Campaign Leader ever being eliminated from a scenario.
In the Do Not Go Gentle scenario, destroy an enemy vehicle with the Tiger or b1 Bis tank.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of North Africa
Win 13 different Heroes of North Africa scenarios.
Win 21 different Heroes of North Africa scenarios.
As the Italians, Bog Down three or more times in a single scenario.
Have 24 or more Dust counters on the board at one time.
Use the Avanti Savoia skill to attempt to rally units that failed their first rally attempt this impulse.
As the Italians, have a unit marked with a Low Ammo counter on the first turn of the scenario.
Receive a No Effect result on a Damage Check as a result of the Stiff Upper Lip skill.
Destroy an enemy vehicle in Close Assault with a unit with the Tank Killer skill.
As the Italians, receive the Unpredictable bonus twice or more in one scenario.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Motherland.
Win 10 different Heroes of the Motherland scenarios.
Win 34 different Heroes of the Motherland scenarios.
Cause a critical hit on an armored vehicle.
Use the For the Motherland ability in a hex with four or more Shaken units.
Using the gun on a vehicle with a Mobility Destroyed marker, destroy another armored vehicle.
Have an armored vehicle struck five or more times by ordnance attacks and not be destroyed.
Have a Partisan unit use a non-Partisan Support Weapon in combat.
Destroy 10 or more armored vehicles in a single scenario.

displayName.english: You Have to Be Kidding Me

description.english: Hit an armored vehicle and roll a penetration minus armor result of 10 or more, and not destroy it.
Complete a scenario from Heroes of the Bitter Harvest.
Win 12 different Heroes of the Bitter Harvest scenarios.
Win 20 different Heroes of the Bitter Harvest scenarios.
Have an Armor Leader destroy 5 or more vehicles in a scenario.
Destroy multiple armored vehicles with Il-2 airstrikes in a scenario.
Have an Incompetent Leader rally 3 or more Shaken units in a scenario.
Use the Dedicated ability to rally a unit that would otherwise not be able to make the attempt.
Use the NKVD ability to reduce rather than Shake a squad.
Have a Soviet or Guards Hero singlehandedly Close Assault and destroy an enemy armored vehicle.
Have a Tachanka wagon team survive a scenario.
